title: Gramercy Tavern's Expat Recipe
full_text:
Gramercy Tavern's Expat Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
aged rum
, such as Banks "7 Golden Age" rum
1/2
ounce
maraschino liqueur
1/4
ounce
fresh juice
from about
2
whole
limes
1/4
ounce
simple syrup
(see note)
3
dashes
Angostura bitters
Lime wheel
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, then add the rum, maraschino, lime juice, simple syrup, and bitters. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds.
Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Special equipment
saucepan, cocktail shaker, and strainer

5 Fabulous Fall Cocktail Recipes from Gramercy Tavern in NYC
